details: Message from Agent-4: ROLE_ASSIGNMENT Agent-8 INTEGRATION_SPECIALIST 'Discord webhook integration' '2 cycles' - Load integration_specialist.json protocols and begin task execution immediately. Priority: HIGH. Assigned by: ...

action: Operating Order Review and Agents.md Update - Enhanced documentation with Universal Operating Protocols including CYCLE_DONE, BLOCKER escalation, SLA monitoring, Quality Gates enforcement, SSOT validation, and 5-Agent Mode coordination protocols. All operating order details now comprehensively documented in Agents.md

Identified critical agent identity system gap and messaged Captain Agent-4 for strategic guidance. Discovered messaging format inconsistency between 'Agent-X' and 'agent_x' formats. Successfully sent message requesting guidance on dynamic identity detection, documentation fixes, and confusion prevention.

Fixed critical Agent-4 directory structure issue. Agent-4 IS the captain but messages were going to separate 'captain' directory instead of 'Agent-4' directory. Created Agent-4/inbox and moved all captain messages there. This resolves the confusion about where Agent-4 actually receives messages.

Successfully deleted redundant 'captain' directory. Agent-4 IS the captain and now has proper directory structure with inbox and all necessary files. System is now clean and consistent - no more confusion about where Captain Agent-4 receives messages.
